page.title: 07Housing continued.
page.content:
Most tenants live in three-bedroomed houses.Several blocks of council flats exist:the main ones are Freehold,College Bank,Ashfield Valley and Falinge. Private housing developments have grown up on the outskirts of Rochdale,which offer attractive detached and semi-detached properties,in a quiet rural setting. TERRACED HOUSING. Terraced houses long and thin, Most the same,and nowhere to play. Houses and houses,all in rows, Being repaired in the envelope scheme.
My neighbours have always got the music loud at night, You never get to sleep, The walls are to thin. Kirsty McCall aged10.
